items.text: Step 5. Fixing delayed notifications for a particular app
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: Select the respective app, make sure "Restrict app background data" feature is turned off.
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: Go to Apps from the phone Settings and open up the respective app.
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: Tap on"Clear Cache" button to flush the cache.
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: You can also tap on‘Clear data" button to delete all the data of the app.
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: Both of these options will be set to 5 minutes, which is perfect as most connections usually timeout after 5 minutes or more.
items.href: How to Fix Android Delayed Notifications - Hongkiat

items.text: Tap on the Apply button to apply this heartbeat interval and you should start receiving notifications in time.
